dcterms:creator: R. S. AG Barto
C. Anderson
dcterms:description: A system comprising of a cart that may move from side to side, with a joint connecting the cart to one end of a pole. The objective of the agent is to find the optimal policy to balance the pole atop the cart, by applying a force (left or right) to either side.
dcterms:title: CartPole

dcterms:creator: R. Sutton
dcterms:description: A system featuring 2 links and 2 joints. The objective is to swing the end of the lower link above a given height as fast as possible by applying torque (Clockwise, counterclockwise, or none).
dcterms:title: Acrobot
